name: lineup Emojies
description:
Emoji sliding puzzle game.
Game can be played with emoji icons and emoji pictures -
in emoji icons mode goal is to lineup same emojies in horizontal line,
doesn't necessarily in the same order as the game starts as long as all emojies in horizontal lines mach up;
images mode is harder - goal is to reassemble scattered emoji picture by sliding lines of image tiles vertically and horizontally,
so all tiles has to be put back to the original position.
Icons mode can be played from 3x3 to 8x8,
and pictures mode from 3x3 to 6x6.
